summary: Added more items to all three sliders for testing: Testimonials increased from 3 to 8 items, Popular Courses from 4 to 8 items, Blogs from 4 to 10 items. Updated blogImageNodes array to match new blog count. Navigation buttons should now be active and testable.
current_status: All sliders now have enough items (8-10) to activate navigation buttons. Ready for testing navigation functionality.
